attributes.action: To withdraw the CBT Test for moped
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the change of law regarding this subject,it has brought nothing but confusion.How can a rider pass a test for a small vehicle then have to take it two years later.This test has now turned into a money making exercise without care for safer -riding

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
